description.en: Learn how to use 'not even' to express 'ni siquiera' in negative sentences.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'not even' para expresar 'ni siquiera' en frases negativas.

prompt.es: Ni siquiera me gustan las películas italianas.

exercises.solution: I don't even like Italian films.

tip.en: 'Not even' means 'ni siquiera' and goes after the auxiliary verb in negative sentences, just like 'even' with verbs.
tip.es: 'Not even' significa 'ni siquiera' y va después del verbo auxiliar en frases negativas, igual que 'even' con los verbos.

exercises.solution: He didn't even say thank you.
